attributes.additional_details: Help us to get the correct information on how we can achieve this.
attributes.background: Help us to get the police station back open to bring the crime rate of the town down and keep people safe and secure

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local police stations are a matter for the relevant police force, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could contact your police and crime commissioner (PCC) to make a suggestion or a complaint about how your local area is policed: https://www.gov.uk/police-and-crime-commissioners
